page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT in Withington 1
page.content: The largest employer in the area is British Industrial Sand (B.I.S.) who {extract sand}for the glass industry. They employ about 160 people. Other employers are several horticultural establishments, a garage, a sub post office and a public house. Most of the farms in the area are run within a family. A. Burgess Highway{Garage}has been established for fifty years and employs 2 men full_time and 1 man part_time. Evans Bros. Garage is sub let from A. Burgess Highway Garage and employs the 2 brothers and a contract mechanic. Cheshire{Nurseries}who specialise in the production of trees and shrubs employ 8 people all on a full_time basis. Coutts Bros. who grow seedlings for the horticultural trade employ 7 men and 3 women full_time and 18 women
